data.title: Surprising Things About 'Mean Girls' That Fans Don't Know
data.meta_description: "Mean Girls" defined the '00s generation. Lindsay Lohan, Lacey Chabert, Amanda Seyfried, and Rachel McAdams as Regina George are hotter than the Burn Book.
data.text:
Both ScarJo and Blake Lively tested for the role of Karen Smith, but it was clear Amanda Seyfried was born to play ‚Äúone of the dumbest girls you will ever meet.‚Äù It‚Äôs kinda like she had ESPN or something....

Does James Franco look sexy with his hair pushed back?? Because he was almost Aaron Samuels. Thankfully, Tina Fey came to her senses and went with the ~irreplaceable~ Jonathan Bennett‚Äîbecause she thought he looked like a young Jimmy Fallon. She‚Äôs not wrong!

You know how it goes: ‚ÄúAll you sucka MCs ain‚Äôt got nothin‚Äô on me...‚Äù But before actor Rajiv Surendra got in front of the camera, he needed a pep talk. ‚ÄúBefore shooting the scene, Tina, Amy and Lindsay took a video in their hotel room of Amy doing the rap with Tina and Lindsay beatboxing,‚Äù he said in 2019. ‚ÄúIt actually did help. I don‚Äôt know if the rap would have been executed the way it appeared in the film if it had not been for that video.‚Äù

While on the topic of the Winter Talent Show...Daniel Franzese revealed the only person in the audience that saw his Christina Aguilera moment was his mom. Yup, movie magic made it look like the auditorium was full.

Don‚Äôt know about you, but I felt personally victimized by Regina George when she stared deep into my soul to describe the ‚Äúugliest effing skirt‚Äù she‚Äôd ever seen. It only happens for a split second, but her unmistakable glare directly into the camera‚Äîwhether done on purpose or not‚Äîgives off major ‚Äúif Jim Halpert were evil‚Äù vibes.

Despite seeing the back of his head for literally .05 seconds in the entire movie, Mean Girls wouldn‚Äôt be the same without Glen Coco. And, yes, Glen freakin‚Äô Coco is a very real name and a friend of Tina Fey‚Äôs.

Ah, there he is! The man, the myth, the legend. Actor David Reale, then just 19 years old, auditioned for the movie but wasn‚Äôt cast. That didn‚Äôt stop him from SNEAKING ON TO THE SET, stealing food, being caught, and then being given a small, completely made up on the spot part as ‚Äúa consolation prize.‚Äù He was never paid, didn‚Äôt get a credit in the movie, and, in his own words, ‚Äújust sat in a chair and tried not to stare at Lindsay Lohan.‚Äù Hear that, kids? Never give up on your dreams!

Amanda Seyfried confirmed her character never wrote anything in those iconic pages at all, saying it was all her ‚Äúinsecure‚Äù friends. Which is kinda the most fire burn of them all üî•üî•üî•.

And Rachel McAdams was almost Cady. Maybe it was because Rachel McAdams was nearly a decade older than her, but Lindsay Lohan acted ‚Äúintimidated‚Äù and ‚Äúquite nervous‚Äù around the then-25-year-old actress when they first met. Her uneasiness caused director Mark Waters to swap their roles. "It did something to Lindsay I liked, so in the testing process head-to-head, Rachel was the better choice," he revealed.

‚ÄúI was folding sweaters in front room‚ÄîI think I was shirtless or something‚Äîand checked my phone on my break,‚Äù Jonathan Bennett said in 2019. ‚ÄúI had a message from my agent saying, ‚ÄòCall me back right away; you‚Äôre the lead in the new Paramount movie and have to go to Canada tomorrow.‚Äô I was like, ‚ÄòCool, I‚Äôll call you back after my shift,‚Äô and he said, ‚ÄòYou don't have a shift anymore‚Äîgo home and start packing.‚Äô I up and quit.‚Äù

Like, loves it so much that she referenced it in a song. 2009‚Äôs ‚ÄúObsessed‚Äù starts with her saying, ‚ÄúWhy you so obsessed with me?‚Äù √† la Regina George. If that‚Äôs not enough proof for you, the music video has someone get hit by a bus at the end. In 2020, Tina Fey continued to bless us by quizzing Mariah on her Mean Girls knowledge. Which, spoiler, is impressive.

What you know: Cady and her zoologist parents lived in Africa so they could study animals. What you don‚Äôt know: Before booking Mean Girls, Lacey Chabert voiced Eliza in The Wild Thornberrys. The *legendary* cartoon was about a family who travels across Africa to learn about wildlife. Coincidence? Nah.

That‚Äôs right‚Äîonce upon a time, Tina Fey was made of cold, shiny, hard plastic. I‚Äôll hold for a sec and let that sink in. ‚ÄúI revisited high school behaviors of my own‚Äîfutile, poisonous, bitter behaviors that served no purpose,‚Äù the comedy queen admitted to the New York Times. Sorry, I‚Äôm in denial.

Abercrombie model, author...is there anything Jonathan Bennett can‚Äôt do?? In 2018, he penned The Burn Cookbook, aka the only collection of recipes that will motivate me to make more than a bowl of cereal.

Nice wig, Janis Regina. Clearly, the iconic quote was directed at the wrong person. Rachel McAdams reportedly didn‚Äôt want to bleach her hair for the role, so she was given a $10,000 wig. Which meeeeans...the random mathlete who said ‚ÄúI hear her hair‚Äôs insured for $10,000‚Äù was kinda right??

Look past Regina‚Äôs long blonde hair (especially now that you know it‚Äôs not real!), and you‚Äôll spot the flyer to her left that reveals the talent show was on November 27, 2003. Personally, I‚Äôd rather be stuffing my face with pie on Thanksgiving, but that‚Äôs just me.

In 2015, Dylan‚Äôs Candy Bar gave us the gift we never knew we needed when it released actual K√§lteen Bars. Instead of burning up your carbs, it filled your tastebuds with peanut buttery goodness. Wanna try it yourself? Here‚Äôs the recipe.

Is she a regular mom? Nope. Does she have a name? Tbh, I had no idea. Turns out, Mrs. George‚Äôs first name is June. Cady‚Äôs parents are Chip and Betsy. The only parent without a first name is Mr. George.

Speaking of June, the bond she shared with her dog is...let‚Äôs say interesting. ‚ÄúThey, like, pinned a piece of a cocktail wiener into [Amy Poehler‚Äôs] bra. I thought this dog was going to tear her apart,‚Äù Rachel McAdams recalled to Entertainment Weekly.
